committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Higher Education, Lifelong Learning, and Competitiveness

official_title: To prohibit Federal grants to or contracts with Columbia University.
short_title: Restore Patriotism to University Campuses Act
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Restore Patriotism to University Campuses Act - Forbids the provision of certain federal funds by grant or contract to Columbia University of New York City or any subelement of such school because it allowed Iranian President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad to speak on its campus. Exempts student financial aid funds from such prohibition.

titles.title: Restore Patriotism to University Campuses Act
To prohibit Federal grants to or contracts with Columbia University.
